summary: The Poet looks back over his life and work, recalling his inspirations and obsessions.
cast: Jean Cocteau|Françoise Arnoul|Claudine Auger|Charles Aznavour|Brigitte Bardot|Lucia Bosè|Yul Brynner|María Casares|Françoise Christophe|Michèle Comte|Nicole Courcel|Henri Crémieux|Edouard Dermithe|Luis Miguel Dominguín|Guy Dute|Michael Goodliffe|Daniel Gélin|Alice Heyliger|Philippe Juzan|Serge Lifar|Jean-Pierre Léaud|Jean Marais|Daniel Moosmann|Brigitte Morisan|Jean-Claude Petit|Philippe|Pablo Picasso|François Périer|Jacqueline Roque|Françoise Sagan|Alice Sapritch|Annette Stroyberg|Henri Torrès|Roger Vadim|Francine Weisweiller|Marie-Josèphe Yoyotte
title: El testamento de Orfeo
